Package View

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardPiece
    Each board piece (cell) of the board
    BoardRenderer
    Board renderer - the board panel that is displayed in the center Observer - Observe if there is a change in board in model, then update the board view
    CustomButton
    Each of the button in view is a custombutton
    CustomGameActionButton
    Custom action button represent an action
    GameMenu
    View of the menu
    GameView
    View of the game Observer - Observe if there is a change in player's action sequence, if there is then update the label (Wong Tiong Kiat)
    InstructionView
    View of the instruction Design pattern used - Singleton, can only have one instruction view at a time
